title: Qalat-e Markazi-ye Hamidabad
text: Qalat-e Markazi-ye Hamidabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Qalāt-e Markazī-ye Ḩamīdābād; also known as Qalāt-e Ḩamīdābād-e Markazī) is a village in <a href="Sarrud-e%20Jonubi%20Rural%20District">Sarrud-e Jonubi Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Boyer-Ahmad%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Boyer-Ahmad%20County">Boyer-Ahmad County</a>, <a href="Kohgiluyeh%20and%20Boyer-Ahmad%20Province">Kohgiluyeh and Boyer-Ahmad Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 104, in 32 families.
